name: Before it's too late (Gelikus)
description:
----Description----

Before it's too late is a 2D pixel art platformer focused on tension and veritcality. You need to escape from a cave, before the lava fills everything and the timer runs out.

  • Jump from platform to platform
  • Destroy the blocks on your way
  • Make very precise movement

Download now for a short and intense escaping experience
